title: 27 in. Wood Handle Closed Back Square Point Shovel
description: This closed back square point shovel has the perfect design for working in small areas. It features a closed back with a steel plate welded over the pocket on the underside of the blade that adds strength, keeps dirt from piling up, and protects wood handles from dampness and rot. This shovel is ideal for contractor as well as professional use on the jobsite. The D-grip was made for exceptional comfort and durability.
